name: vscode-augment
displayName: Augment Code: AI Coding Agent for JavaScript, Go, TypeScript, Python & more
description: Augment is an AI copilot with a superior context engine and agents that truly understand your codebaseâ€”from a single line to 100M lines. Tackle complex architectures and legacy systems with reliable answers, context-aware code actions, and instant comprehension.

augment.completions.enableAutomaticCompl.description: Provide automatic inline code completions (manual code completions are always available).

augment.completions.enableQuickSuggestio.description: Add Augment to the IntelliSense pop-up suggestions.

augment.completions.enableChatInputCompl.description: Provide automatic completions in the chat input box.

augment.enableEmptyFileHint.description: Display a hint to use Augment Chat when an empty file is open.

augment.conflictingCodingAssistantCheck.description: Check for conflicting coding assistants when starting up and installing extensions.

timeoutMs.description: The default timeout for completions (in milliseconds).

maxWaitMs.description: The max timeout for completions items (in milliseconds). This allows Augment to retry completions that are cancelled due to changes in the editor.

addIntelliSenseSuggestions.description: Enable completions in the intellisense pop-up.

command.description: The command to run the MCP server

args.description: Arguments to pass to the MCP server command

timeoutMs.description: Timeout in milliseconds for MCP server operations

env.description: Dictionary of Environment variables to set for the MCP server

augment.nextEdit.enableBackgroundSuggest.description: Enable Next Edit to run in the background and suggest changes in the editor.

augment.nextEdit.enableGlobalBackgroundS.description: Enable Next Edit to hint changes in files beyond the active editor tab.

augment.nextEdit.enableAutoApply.description: Automatically apply suggestions when you jump to them.

augment.nextEdit.showDiffInHover.description: Show a diff of the suggested change in the hover.

augment.nextEdit.highlightSuggestionsInT.description: Highlight all lines with a suggestion in addition to showing gutter icons and gray hint-text.

augment.chat.userGuidelines.description: Edit this field on the Augment settings page.

augment.experimental.terminal.vscodeTerm.description: Select the implementation Augment should use for using the terminal

keybindings.when: vscode-augment.enableNextEdit && vscode-augment.nextEdit.canDismiss && (((editorTextFocus || editorHoverFocused) && !suggestWidgetVisible) || activePanel == 'workbench.view.extension.augment-panel' || activeViewlet == 'workbench.view.extension.augment-panel') && !inlineSuggestionVisible && !editorHasSelection && (!vim.active || vim.mode == 'Normal') && focusedView != 'augment-chat'

scripts.build: pnpm run vscode:build-dev && pnpm run common-webviews:build
scripts.build:prod: pnpm run vscode:esbuild-prod && pnpm run common-webviews:build
scripts.test: pnpm run vscode:test && pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.test:fix: pnpm run lint:fix && pnpm run test
scripts.package-extension: STABLE_VSCODE_RELEASE_VERSION=$(head -n1 version)-$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD | tr '/_' '-').$(git log --format='%ct.%h' -n1) bazel build //clients/vscode:package-extension-prerelease --config=local_output --compilation_mode=opt --stamp && cp ../../bazel-bin/clients/vscode/vscode-augment-prerelease.vsix .
scripts.package-extension-nightly: STABLE_VSCODE_RELEASE_VERSION=$(head -n1 version)-$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD | tr '/_' '-').$(git log --format='%ct.%h' -n1) bazel build //clients/vscode:package-extension-nightly --config=local_output --compilation_mode=opt --stamp && cp ../../bazel-bin/clients/vscode/vscode-augment-nightly.vsix .
scripts.package-for-release: [ "$RELEASE_CHANNEL" = "prerelease" ] && pnpm run vsce-package -- --pre-release || pnpm run vsce-package
scripts.vscode:lint: pnpm run vscode:eslint && pnpm run vscode:prettier
scripts.vscode:lint:fix: pnpm run vscode:eslint:fix && pnpm run vscode:prettier:fix
scripts.vscode:eslint: git ls-files -- . | xargs pre-commit run eslint --files
scripts.vscode:eslint:fix: git ls-files -- . | xargs pre-commit run eslint --hook-stage=manual --files
scripts.vscode:prettier: git ls-files -- . | xargs pre-commit run prettier --hook-stage=manual --files
scripts.vscode:prettier:fix: git ls-files -- . | xargs pre-commit run prettier --files
scripts.vscode:test: pnpm run build:prod && pnpm run vscode:lint && pnpm run vscode:jest
